channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-27974] Fix flaky test - TestReplicationMetricCollector.testSuccessStageFailure
item.description:

is already resolved and cannot longer be used

comments.comment:
Committed to master.

Thanx InvisibleProgrammer for the contribution!!!
